property.name: enableButtons
property.label: Enable buttons
property.description: Determine which buttons to show (Both, Back, Next, None)

property.name: nextButtonLabel
property.label: Next Button Label
property.description: This can be used to set the Label on the button.

property.name: backButtonLabel
property.label: Back Button Label
property.description: This can be used to set the Label on the button.
